name: Cycling 2011
description:
Get the Yellow Jersey !

In this free version, you play the leader of your team in the last stage. You are second overall at 7 seconds of the yellow jersey "Maillot Jaune".

Can you win the race ?

Playing Cycling 2011, you will be able to :
-Race against 20 opponents,
-Manage your leader fatigue,
-Ask teammates help at appropriate times.

==================
Cycling Pro 2011 "full version" provides:
- 12 singles stages,
- Race championships of 3, 7 or 12 stages,
-Town, countryside and mountain stages,
- Automatic backup to resume interrupted games,
- 3 difficulty levels
=================
